cleaned_text: A unique collection of Ayurveda inspired aromatherapy oils to balance mind and emotions throughout daily activities. Shankara's aromatherapeutic body oils will keep your skin moisturized while relaxing your mind and improving your overall sense of well-being. These oils can be used as moisturizers, massage oils or bath oils.
